name: Tini - Food & Beverage Template
description:
Hi, welcome to Tini Food & Beverage Template. This template is built using the Tini Design System of Tiki. We are also building a Tini App solution where you can build and publish app(s) on Tiki platfotm.


Template includes:

  • UI screens for each OS (Android & iOS)
  • Flows


If you have questions or suggestions you can reach out to us on the Tini Design community


V1.1.0

1 - Order details:

  • Change the design of Order status for scalability

2 - Use transparent Navigation bar with only navigation box for all screens that use overlay.

3 - Profile:

  • Add cover image



V1.0.0 - Initial release

Features:

  • Store Pickup.
  • Delivery.
  • Order management.
  • Other features: Search product, Search store, Address management.
